content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Orsetta., Orsetta just said to you: '"Oh, thanks, Marco! That’s a relief, everyone’s getting paid on time!"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Orsetta! Glad to hear it."

You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Orsetta., Orsetta just said to you: '"Grazie, Marco! That was… efficient, to say the least."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Orsetta. Just trying to keep things running smoothly."
